content: on the instep -4- instep pattern round 1 * k4 p1 1/1 lc p1 * repeat 4 times round 2 * k4 p1 1/1 rc p1 * repeat 4 times round 3 * k4 p1 1/1 lc p1 * repeat 4 times round 4 * k4 p1 1/1 rc p1 * repeat 4 times round 5 * k4 p1 1/1 lc p1 * repeat 4 times round 6 * k4 p1 1/1 rc p1 * repeat 4 times round 7 * p1 1/1 lc p1 k4 * repeat 4 times round 8 * p1 1/1 rc p1 k4 * repeat 4 times round 9 * p1 1/1 lc p1 k4 * repeat 4 times round 10 * p1 1/1 rc p1 k4 * repeat 4 times round 11 * p1 1/1 lc p1 k4 * repeat 4 times round 12 * p1 1/1 rc p1 k4 * repeat 4 times keep working until you reach the desired length you should start the toe just above your pinkie toe decrease 4 sts in each decreasing round the pattern is always the same first st k1 then ssk left leaning decrease knit across until 3 sts remain before the end of this side k2 tg right leaning decrease k1 this is what you repeat on the sole too decreasing rounds 1 4 7 10 12 from round 14 decrease in each round until 16 sts remain 8-8 sts on each side if you have broader toes decrease until 20 sts remain 10-10 graft the toe with kitchener stitch need more help → https //youtu be/eyjrcsbd3nm weave in ends block congratulations your socks are done sockisticated 2025 -5-
